name: Aboard the SS Starforge
description: Starforge is an experimental space simulation and level creation system where science, design, and mild existential dread collide.

webserver-port.name: Webserver Port
webserver-port.description: Port for the Starforge webserver to run on, applied on restart.

websocket-port.name: WebSocket Port
websocket-port.description: Port for the Starforge WebSocket server to run on, applied on restart.
